1.title: Wild Inhabitants of Jasper National Park
1.plot: Escape to the rugged wilds of Jasper National Park, in the heart of the Canadian Rockies. There you'll meet some of the continent's most iconic wildlife: from deer to bighorn sheep to elk.

11.title: Chilean Desert from Above
11.plot: Soar high above the sweeping expanse of Chile's great mountains - naturally carved fortresses of towering rock that cast shadows over a large stretch of wild grasslands in the Atacama Desert. It's a unique view that might leave you a little breathless.

17.title: Chile's Otherworldly Atacama Desert
17.plot: Embark on a cinematic trek across one of South America's most arresting landscapes. Chile's Atacama Desert is proof that the harshest of environments are some of the most beautiful.

19.title: Bolivia's High-Altitude Plateaus
19.plot: In the pristine and isolated wilderness of Bolivia lies an elevated land of still lakes and distant peaks. Experience the harshest of earthly landscapes, which only the most resilient creatures can call home.

20.title: Llamas and Flamingos in the Wild
20.plot: Spend some time in the company of two of Bolivia's most distinctive wildlife dwellers as they go about their day: spirited Llamas and elegant flamingos. See both at home in the country's serene and otherworldly Altiplano.

21.title: The Altiplano Flamingos
21.plot: It's not a sight you expect to see in the barren expanse of the Bolivian Altiplano, but is one you'll be glad you witnessed: a flock of wild flamingos feeding in the tranquil salt flats.

26.title: Baby Animals Down Under
26.plot: A joey in a pouch? Check. Cute baby wombats feeding? Yes. And don't forget the kangaroo's even more adorable cousin: the wallaby. Spend a few enchanting moments at Tasmania's Zoodoo Wildlife Park and the St. Louis Zoo in the company of these iconic Australian baby animals.

28.title: Sunbathing Seal Pups
28.plot: Australian fur seal pups are playful, curious, cute, sociable, and full of energy--except when it's time to take a sunny power nap. Warm your heart with this endearing clip with one of the cutest baby animals around at Phillip Island Nature Park.

30.title: Alpaca Crias Lazing and Grazing
30.plot: Alpacas always seem at perfect ease among highlands. And for these little ones, it's all about resting, nursing, and staying close to the herd. Spend time with some of nature's gentler, calmer babies at Australia's Zoodoo Wildlife Park and the Shamarra Alpaca Farm in New Zealand.

31.title: Fun and Games with Baby Impalas
31.plot: Nestled in the serene beauty of Entabeni Game Reserve in South Africa, a herd of grazing impalas do their best to keep a firm eye on their young. It's a touching slice of family life in this idyllic corner of nature.

32.title: Fox Cub Nap Time
32.plot: A napping cape fox cub breathes gently in his sleep, wakes up, then heads off for a morning forage in the Entabeni Game Reserve in South Africa. It's a delightful interlude with one of nature's more winsome baby animals.

35.title: Playful Primates Posing
35.plot: Take a heartwarming glimpse into primate society as gorillas from Como Park Zoo in St. Paul, MN, and mandrills from the Jacksonville Zoo in Florida demonstrate their playful and tender qualities.

36.title: Curious Coyote Family
36.plot: Watch a couple of tiny coyote pups play-fighting at Parc Omega in Quebec, Canada, while their mother looks on with a watchful eye. It's a tender slice of coyote family life that will brighten your day.

38.title: Amazing Reefs of Belize
38.plot: The coastal waters surrounding Belize are home to some of the most majestic creatures on the planet, including spotted eagle rays, Hawksbill turtles, and millions of exotic fish, nestled among the ancient reef. Immerse yourself in this underwater nirvana.

42.title: Socorro's Underwater Kingdom
42.plot: Far beneath the depths of the coastal waters surrounding Socorro Island is an underwater kingdom of vibrant and exotic splendor. Dive into this magnificent world of coral reefs, remorseless predators, and colorful shoals of exotic fish.

45.title: The Marine Wonderland of Belize
45.plot: Off the coast of Belize and beneath the Caribbean Sea lies a unique reef ecosystem with a stunning variety of life--from the primitive and graceful moray eel to the ancient and menacing nurse shark. Explore this magical world of marine diversity.

47.title: Hummingbirds at Rest
47.plot: Watch a group of hummingbirds at the Arizona-Sonora Desert Museum as they casually go about their day--from protecting their nest to feeding their chicks, to simply relaxing on a branch. It's a soothing interlude with one of nature's more tranquil inhabitants.

54.title: Snow Monkeys in Springtime
54.plot: A snow monkey mother cuddles an infant who stares wide-eyed at their lush green surroundings, while a troop heads to the waterfront for an afternoon dip. Enjoy their loving interactions as they forage, nap, and play at the Highland Wildlife Park and the Highland Park Zoo.

57.title: Japan's Hidden Island Paradise
57.plot: Take in the remote and sensual beauty of a Japanese island-paradise, where mist-capped mountains stand tall amongst lush, green forests. It's a serene slice of natural splendor in a distant part of the world.

59.title: Geothermal Wonders of Iceland
59.plot: From iridescent mountain springs to mysterious volcanic geysers that suffuse the cold air with heavy plumes of steam, the Icelandic landscape is a geothermal marvel that will capture your imagination.

69.title: Zebra Foals on a Stroll
69.plot: Life's a breeze for baby zebras tagging alongside their parents. Follow foals on their relaxing jaunts grazing and wandering around Georgia's Wild Animal Safari and Entabeni Game Reserve in South Africa.

imdb.plot outline: Venture to the corners of the earth that exude a sense of wonder and tranquility. From landscapes that appear untouched by humankind to wildlife roaming through their native habitats, experience some of these amazing natural settings in all of their breathtaking and peaceful beauty.
imdb.title: Nature Scenes
plot: Venture to the corners of the earth that exude a sense of wonder and tranquility. From landscapes that appear untouched by humankind to wildlife roaming through their native habitats, experience some of these amazing natural settings in all of their breathtaking and peaceful beauty.
